last_episode_to_air.name: Our Beloved Summer
last_episode_to_air.overview: Ready to pursue his next dream, Ung sets his sights on studying overseas. When he asks Yeon-su to join him, she has a tough decision to make.

name: Our Beloved Summer
overview: Years after filming a viral documentary in high school, two bickering ex-lovers get pulled back in front of the camera — and into each other's lives.

episodes.name: I Know What You Did Last Summer
episodes.overview: As high schoolers, Kook Yeon-su and Choi Ung give a documentary crew a peek into their lives. Ten years later, they've gone their separate ways.

episodes.name: 1792 Days of Summer
episodes.overview: Yeon-su and Ung reunite for the first time in five years when she shows up at his door with a proposal to work together on an art project.

episodes.name: 10 Things I Hate About You
episodes.overview: Eager to film a follow-up documentary, Kim Ji-ung sets out to persuade Yeon-su and Ung. But getting them to agree proves to be a challenge.

episodes.name: The Boy, or the Girl, We Liked Then
episodes.overview: Yeon-su and Ung's squabbles begin even before the cameras start rolling. Ung refuses to dignify an infuriating plagiarism accusation with a response.

episodes.name: A Secret That Can’t Be Told
episodes.overview: Ji-ung recounts how he and Ung became friends in their childhood. Yeon-su wants to apologize to Ung, but can't quite bring herself to do it.

episodes.name: Pride and Prejudice
episodes.overview: Ung wakes up on the morning of the live drawing show with a few gaps in his memory. Watching him at work, Yeon-su sees an unfamiliar side of him.

episodes.name: Catch Me If You Can
episodes.overview: Ung and Yeon-su attempt to run away from having to see each other, but wind up in the same place anyway. NJ stands up to her cyberbullies.

episodes.name: Before Sunset
episodes.overview: A forced vacation commences for Yeon-su and Ung when the documentary crew traps them at a mountain retreat. Awkward tensions run high between the pair.

episodes.name: Just Friends
episodes.overview: When she doesn't hear from Ung after their return from the retreat, Yeon-su decides to confront him. He has a disorienting response for her.

episodes.name: Hello, My Soul Mate
episodes.overview: With his mother back in town, Ji-ung stops going home so he can avoid seeing her. Watching NJ and Ung go on a date vexes Yeon-su to no end.

episodes.name: Our Nights Are More Beautiful Than Your Days
episodes.overview: Ahead of the final day of filming, gossip about Ung and NJ causes a stir. Ji-ung receives pointed advice about his documentary edit.

episodes.name: Begin Again
episodes.overview: For Ung and Yeon-su, a new beginning is equal parts sweet and clumsy. When NJ bumps into Ji-ung, she invites him out for a drink.

episodes.name: Love Actually
episodes.overview: After soliciting dating advice from a co-worker, Yeon-su acts out of character in front of Ung. Meanwhile, Ji-ung takes some time to himself.

episodes.name: Life Is Beautiful
episodes.overview: Ung asks Yeon-su a question that's difficult for her to answer. As Lee Sol-i deals with an unwanted surprise in her bar, Gu Eun-ho happens to swing by.

episodes.name: Three Idiots
episodes.overview: A noticeably down Ji-ung pours himself into his work instead of going home. Ung waits for Yeon-su to come and see the final night of his art exhibit.

episodes.name: Our Beloved Summer
episodes.overview: Ready to pursue his next dream, Ung sets his sights on studying overseas. When he asks Yeon-su to join him, she has a tough decision to make.
